sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO jnitvisitcount ( SITE , VDATE , VHOUR , USER_OS , BROWSER , HIT ) VALUES ( #site# , #vdate# , #vhour# , #userOs# , #browser# , 1 )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE jnitvisitcount SET SITE=#site# , VDATE=#vdate# , VHOUR=#vhour# , USER_OS=#userOs# , BROWSER=#browser# , HIT=#hit# WHERE VDATE=#vdate#
sqlMap.select: SELECT SITE , VDATE , VHOUR , USER_OS , BROWSER , (SELECT SUM(hit) FROM jnitvisitcount WHERE VDATE=#vdate#) AS HIT FROM jnitvisitcount WHERE VDATE=#vdate# GROUP BY HIT
